attributes.background: Recognise Palestine as a state within 1967 borders. Revoke the Balfour Declaration.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Call for the UK government to formally recognise the State of Palestine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300450

Call for an immediate end to the Israeli blockade on the people of Gaza: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308206

Impose sanctions on Israel if it annexes settlements in the West Bank: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/318454
